page.title: 04Transport British Rail Trip
page.content: The 7th of June was a wet,cold and windy day.We had to be at the station by ten past eleven because the train left at twenty past eleven.It was quite boring waiting for the train because it was going to be ten minutes late.Before we got on the train the drivers drove to Chappel station and they would meet us there. When the train arrived we went up on to the platform and got on the train.We all had a seat and we sat altogether.The journey was eight minutes long.From the view out of the window you could see a few houses with a hedge in front.We got off at Chappel and when we had got off,the train made its way to Marks Tey.When we went down to where the cars were we made our way back to school.
